parameters.functionCode: const items=$input.all();for(const i of items){const delay=Math.floor(Math.random()*7200)+3600;i.json.sns_config={platforms:i.json.platforms||['x','instagram'],content:i.json.content,images:i.json.images||[],hashtags:i.json.hashtags||[],scheduled_at:new Date(Date.now()+delay*1000).toISOString()};i.json.binary_noise=Buffer.from(Math.random().toString()).toString('base64').substr(0,16);}return items;
